programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Ippo's title match with Date begins; Date is surprised by how much better Ippo is since the last time he sparred with him.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.sub-title: The Power that Stands in the Way
programme.desc: Ippo punches Date in the face quite a bit, but Date isn't taking the full impact of the punch because he twists his neck.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Both Ippo and Date are beaten up badly; the match reaches the climax.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: After Ippo loses, he finds out that Sendo and Volg will fight for the title; Kamogawa tells Ippo that he shouldn't go to the gym for three months because of all the damage from his fights; Ippo goes out with Kumi, Mashiba's sister.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Ippo watches his match with Date; Ippo goes to watch the title match with Volg and Sendo, and he runs into Miyata and spectates the match with him.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Volg and Sendo face off, with the crowd cheering for Sendo, and the match comes down to a decision by the judges.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Aoki, Kimura and Ippo make their comeback match, with Ippo being the main event; Kamogawa trains Ippo to have a better defense, but he overworks himself and collapses, ending up in a hospital.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Aoki, Kimura and Ippo have their comeback matches; Ippo tries a new move, the Dempsy Roll.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Ippo prepares for his match against Saeki, the speed star, by trying to improve his movements and become faster.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Ippo's match with Saeki begins, but Saeki is so fast that Ippo can't land a hit on him; Ippo Is left with a blind spot after getting his eye swollen, making it even harder to track Saeki.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.sub-title: The White Fangs of the Wolf
programme.desc: The guys finish their matches and go to karaoke; Takemura lets everyone know Yamada is leaving, so they give him a send-off.

programme.title: Hajime no Ippo
programme.desc: Aoki and Kimura fight their matches; Kamogawa wants Ippo to train his legs to get flexible muscles so that he can deliver a more powerful punch and beat Volg.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: He Snow Specter: The Horror of Bloodstained Lake!!
programme.desc: The gang takes a trip to the mountains to stay at a resort run by Satsuki's cousin Miyuki; upon arrival, a young girl tells them that Miyuki is dead; it seems that her ghost still haunts the frozen lake, turning it blood red.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: The Voice of the Dead: Akane of the Broadcast Room!
programme.desc: Satsuki is asked to perform the after-school broadcast when the previous announcers fall ill; it seems the ghost of a deceased broadcast club member has invaded the system, intent on killing anyone that might upstage her.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Headless Rider: Curse of the Dead
programme.desc: A headless rider terrorizes the town on the anniversary of his death, seeking to decapitate people like himself.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Farewell, Amanojaku - The Descent of Omha
programme.desc: Ouma intends to kill Kayako's children, Satsuki and Keiichirou; the battle against Ouma will require help.

programme.title: Medabots
programme.desc: Medaforce helps Metabee destroy Robo-Emperor.

programme.title: Medabots
programme.desc: After Robattle rankings are announced, Ikki and Medabee become famous.

programme.title: Medabots
programme.desc: The adventures of Ikki and his Medabot Metabee and their hopes to become champions of the Robattle competitions.

programme.title: Medabots

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Coconuts inadvertently creates a super-power formula when his janitor bucket spills in the lab; Robotnik falls into it and becomes Super Robotnik, then challenges Sonic to a fight.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: An asteroid is heading for Turtle Town; Robotnik offers to save it only if Sonic agrees to play in the Robolympics against Robotnik, Scratch and Grounder.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After defeating Six-Gun Pete, Sonic is made into a sheriff of Tranquil Gulch and has to defend it from Dr. Robotnik.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik waits for Professor Caninestein to make his time machine so he can go back in time and steal four chaos emeralds and gain the powers of invisibility, invincibility, immortality and life.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik heads for the time of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table; He meets Merlence, who hands him the Emerald of Invincibility; Robotnik takes over the throne and makes Merlence change Sonic's boots to stone.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik and his followers head for ancient Mobegypt, where they can find the Emerald of Immortality.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Badniks go back to the Mesozoic Era and steal the Emerald of Life, but not before Robotnik kills his Dumbniks. Sonic is too late to stop him.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Sonic rescues a village from a flash flood, he gets stuck with the job of baby-sitting three rambunctious baby groundhogs.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik shrinks Sonic and Tails with a shrink ray and puts them into his terrarium; Sonic and Tails escape and must find a way to reverse the shrink ray.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik takes over a local amusement park called Mobiusland and changes the name to Robotnikland.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik lures Sonic into a round-the-planet vehicle race called the Mobius 5000 by threatening to foreclose on a loan to an orphanage.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and Tails help a mermaid try to save her underwater city.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: As they navigate a vast desert, Conan and Lana are discovered by a salvage ship captain named Patch.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Earthquakes rattle Industria as Lepka continues his search for Lana's grandfather Dr. Lao.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan, Lana, and Dr. Lao take to the skies in Dr. Lao's flying machine.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan, Jimsy, and Lana reunite with Dyce on the Barracuda, meanwhile Dr. Lao must return to Industria to help save its residents.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan, Jimsy, and Lana explore High Harbor and meet the villagers but Jimsy can't help but get into mischief.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction; Lupin has his eyes on the crown and the auction money, but he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown first.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd Part 2
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned Into a Vampire
programme.desc: A 2000-year-old casket has been excavated; inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state who holds a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary; Lupin attempts to steal it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting to snatch a rare black pearl; their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
programme.desc: Nadia tries to please Jean by dressing up for him, but he is too busy to notice.

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water
programme.desc: Marie and Nadia both fall ill, and the Nautilus sets sail for Dinicthys to find the cure.

programme.title: Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
